channel.title: Dark Mage (Neutral Killer)
channel.description:
I must really like making NK classes.
Dark Mage - Neutral Killer
Passive 1 (Protective Ward): Night and Occupy immune
Passive 2 (Aura Wield): You will appear as a knight to invest ability's on nights that you don't kill
Day ability 1 (Jinx): Your target will die immediately if you are executed today. They will be notified. (4 uses. Works like the hunters retribution)
Day ability 2 (Empower): Spike will kill the target as well (2 uses)
Night ability (Spike): Kill everyone that visits your target. Pierces night immunity (unlimited)
Note: Jinx is useful because you can hold neutrals hostage if you think they might betray you. It can even delay some BD from trying to kill you because they don't want to die and might have other priority's.
